description:
Allow to change the output audio device from the volume indicator menu.

This is a cut-down extension of the Extended Volume indicator without the applications submenu. It's useful to combine the usage with others extensions without having redundancies.

It allows also to mute/unmute the audio card device; others extensions allows this just only for the applications audio streams.
name: Switch output audio devices
